articles.title: You cannot claim right to have sex with partner, says Delhi HC during marital rape case hearing - India Today
articles.description: While hearing a batch of petitions seeking criminalisation of marital rape, Delhi High Court’s Justice C Hari Shankar said, “Even in a marriage, you cannot claim the right to have sexual intercourse with a partner.”
